sect1.title: Appendix A: Sample Configuration Files
sect1.screen: [global] log to stderr = true run dir = C:/ProgramData/ceph crash dir = C:/ProgramData/ceph [client] keyring = C:/ProgramData/ceph/keyring log file = C:/ProgramData/ceph/$name.$pid.log admin socket = C:/ProgramData/ceph/$name.$pid.asok [global] ; Specify IP addresses for monitor nodes as in the following example: ; mon host = [v2:10.1.1.1:3300,v1:10.1.1.1:6789] [v2:10.1.1.2:3300,v1:10.1.1.2:6789] [v2:10.1.1.3:3300,v1:1.1.1.3:6789]

note.para: Directory paths in the ceph.conf must be delimited using forward-slashes.

sect1.screen: ; This file should be copied directly from /etc/ceph/ceph.client.admin.keyring ; The contents should be similar to the following example: [client.admin] key = ADCyl77eBBAAABDDjX72tAljOwv04m121v/7yA== caps mds = "allow *" caps mon = "allow *" caps osd = "allow *" caps mgr = "allow *"
